cu.explanation_en: Setting the AMF IP address to an invalid format 'invalid.ip' will cause IP parsing errors and connection failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofDownlinkSlots to 0 creates a logical contradiction by disabling all downlink transmission, preventing cell operation.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofDownlinkSlots 設定為 0 會產生邏輯矛盾，因為它禁用了所有下行鏈路傳輸，阻止細胞運作。
